en-US.title: SiteSetups
en-US.subtitle: Construction Project Manager
en-US.description:
SiteSetups is a comprehensive construction project management app designed for contractors, builders, and project managers.

Key Features:
- Track projects with detailed task management
- Organize work using industry-standard categories (Structural, Systems, Sheathing, Finishings)
- Capture and attach photos directly from job sites
- Manage materials, suppliers, and labor costs
- Monitor project progress and budgets
- Access your projects from anywhere

Perfect for:
- General contractors
- Home builders
- Renovation specialists
- Construction project managers
- Subcontractors

Stay organized, track progress, and keep your construction projects on schedule with SiteSetups.
en-US.promoText: The essential app for construction professionals to manage projects, tasks, and teams.
en-US.releaseNotes: Initial release of SiteSetups - your construction project management companion.

review.notes:
This is a construction project management app. To test:
1. Create an account or log in
2. Create a new project
3. Add tasks to the project
4. Attach photos to tasks using the camera

No special demo account is required.
